challenges.title: Q1: Scalability
challenges.description: In system design, scalability mainly refers to:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Ability to run without any bugs

c) Ability to have a beautiful UI
d) Ability to store data permanently on disk

challenges.title: Q2: Latency vs Throughput
challenges.description: Latency and throughput are best described as:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Latency = requests per second, Throughput = time per request
b) Latency = time per request, Throughput = requests per second
c) Both mean the same thing
d) Latency is only about database, throughput is only about network
